00010 namespace isis
00011 {
00012 namespace util
00013 {
00014 
00031 class Singletons
00032 {
00033     class SingletonBase: public boost::noncopyable
00034     {
00035     public:
00036         virtual ~SingletonBase();
00037     };
00038     template<typename BASE> class Singleton: public SingletonBase, public BASE {};
00039 
00040     typedef std::multimap<int, SingletonBase *const> prioMap;
00041     prioMap map;
00042     Singletons();
00043     virtual ~Singletons();
00044     template<typename T> Singleton<T> *create( int priority ) {
00045         Singleton<T>* ret( new Singleton<T> );
00046         map.insert( map.find( priority ), std::make_pair( priority, ret ) );
00047         return ret;
00048     }
00049     template<typename T> static Singleton<T>& request( int priority ) {
00050         static Singleton<T> *s = getMaster().create<T>( priority );
00051         //ok this might become a dead ref as well. But its no complex object, and therefore won't be "destructed".
00052         return *s;
00053     }
00054     static Singletons &getMaster();
00055 public:
00061     template<typename T, int PRIO> static Singleton<T> &get() {
00062         return request<T>( PRIO );
00063     }
00064 };
00065 }
00066 }
00067 #endif //SINGLETONS_HPP_INCLUDED
